001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.canvas;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStreamReader;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Optional;
010
011import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
012import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
013
014public class CanvasGradesCSVParserTest {
015
016  @Test
017  void canCreateAssignmentFromText() {
018    String assignmentText = "Name (123)";
019    GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment assignment = CanvasGradesCSVParser.createAssignment(assignmentText);
020    assertThat(assignment.getName(), equalTo("Name"));
021    assertThat(assignment.getId(), equalTo(123));
022  }
023
024  @Test
025  void canCreateAssignmentFromMultiWordText() {
026    String assignmentText = "Two Names (123)";
027    GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment assignment = CanvasGradesCSVParser.createAssignment(assignmentText);
028    assertThat(assignment.getName(), equalTo("Two Names"));
029    assertThat(assignment.getId(), equalTo(123));
030  }
031
032  @Test
033  void canReadAssignmentsFromCSV() throws IOException {
034    CanvasGradesCSVParser parser = createParserFromResource();
035    List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> assignments = parser.getAssignments();
036    assertThat(assignments.get(0).getName(), equalTo("End of Term Survey"));
037    assertThat(assignments.get(0).getId(), equalTo(95625));
038    assertThat(assignments.get(0).getPointsPossible(), equalTo(3.00));
039    assertThat(assignments.get(1).getName(), equalTo("Midterm Survey"));
040    assertThat(assignments.get(1).getId(), equalTo(95626));
041    assertThat(assignments.get(1).getPointsPossible(), equalTo(3.00));
042    assertThat(assignments.get(2).getName(), equalTo("Project 1 POA"));
043    assertThat(assignments.get(2).getId(), equalTo(187669));
044    assertThat(assignments.get(2).getPointsPossible(), equalTo(1.00));
045  }
046
047  private CanvasGradesCSVParser createParserFromResource() throws IOException {
048    return new CanvasGradesCSVParser(new InputStreamReader(Objects.requireNonNull(getClass().getResourceAsStream("canvas.csv"))));
049  }
050
051  @Test
052  void canReadStudentsFromCSV() throws IOException {
053    CanvasGradesCSVParser parser = createParserFromResource();
054    List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent> students = parser.getGrades().getStudents();
055    assertThat(students.get(0).getFirstName(), equalTo("First1"));
056    assertThat(students.get(0).getLastName(), equalTo("Last1"));
057    assertThat(students.get(0).getLoginId(), equalTo("student1"));
058    assertThat(students.get(0).getCanvasId(), equalTo("11111"));
059    assertThat(students.get(0).getSection(), equalTo("CS-410P-069: TOP: Adv Prog In Java"));
060    assertThat(students.get(1).getFirstName(), equalTo("First2"));
061    assertThat(students.get(1).getLastName(), equalTo("Last2"));
062    assertThat(students.get(1).getLoginId(), equalTo("student2"));
063    assertThat(students.get(1).getCanvasId(), equalTo("22222"));
064    assertThat(students.get(1).getSection(), equalTo("CS-510-090: TOP: Adv Prog In Java"));
065  }
066
067  @Test
068  void testStudentIsNotReadFromCSV() throws IOException {
069    CanvasGradesCSVParser parser = createParserFromResource();
070    List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent> students = parser.getGrades().getStudents();
071    assertThat(students, hasSize(2));
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  void canReadGradesFromCSV() throws IOException {
076    CanvasGradesCSVParser parser = createParserFromResource();
077    List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> assignments = parser.getAssignments();
078    List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasStudent> students = parser.getGrades().getStudents();
079
080    GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment quiz1 = getAssignment(assignments, "Quiz 1: Programming Background");
081    assertThat(students.get(0).getScore(quiz1), equalTo(3.00));
082    assertThat(students.get(1).getScore(quiz1), equalTo(2.85));
083
084    GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment quiz2 = getAssignment(assignments, "Quiz 2: Java Language and OOP");
085    assertThat(students.get(0).getScore(quiz2), nullValue());
086    assertThat(students.get(1).getScore(quiz2), equalTo(3.00));
087  }
088
089  private GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment getAssignment(List<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> assignments, String assignmentName) {
090    Optional<GradesFromCanvas.CanvasAssignment> optional = assignments.stream().filter(assignment -> assignment.getName().equals(assignmentName)).findFirst();
091    return optional.orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Can't find assignment \"" + assignmentName + "\""));
092  }
093}
